Protégez vos données bancaires dans la vie réelle!

  • Protège aussi contre le pliage, les rayures, la chaleur et la démagnétisation.

lists.visibleTextBlock: Out of the box simplicity combined with extended functionality and control. The cloud-based console makes remote management and monitoring easy. A single web page displays the security status of all your devices, enables you to activate security on any device and have easy access to Kaspersky Technical Support.

Be secure, no matter which devices you use. Award-winning anti-malware protects your PCs, Macs, file servers and mobile devices from all types of cyber threats. Protect your business and customer data and improve productivity with powerful web control, anti-phishing, anti-spam, anti-ransomware, backup and encryption.

No other vendor can match Kaspersky Lab’s success record in independent tests. We take care of your security while you take care of the business. By combining real-time, cloud-assisted technologies to secure your mobile devices, file servers and PCs, Kaspersky Small Office Security protects your business against the very latest threats.
